quote_first: In a moment I had the office and the night editor’s desk, had told him who I was, and began to dictate. “At
quote_last: by our time (see what time Paris time is for that, and put it in) a French battleship was sunk by the man who is to stop all war. Probably no one on board escaped.” That last was a guess based on the experience of the past.
title: The Man Who Ended War
author: Hollis Godfrey

quote_last: at home. Sunday. She’d be up. Probably reading over a cup of coffee before taking a run before church.
title: Soldier On
author: Vanessa Rasanen

quote_last: . On the screen a wild cat had a rabbit in its mouth.
title: Atomised
author: Michel Houellebecq
